Access to create and modify KG content. Additional permissions required.

policies.key_security: Sensitive keys are stored in an encrypted config file separate from the KG.
policies.post_quantum: All public-key crypto is planned for quantum-resistant algorithms in the future.

pricing.dynamic_pricing: Based on current supply/demand of KG queries.

instructions.end_user: To become an end user, simply register with your wallet details. Your access is secured via token-based authentication.
instructions.domain_expert: To become a domain expert, you must apply with relevant credentials. An admin will validate and assign you expert status.
instructions.admin: Administrators are assigned manually. They have full access to validate changes, manage tokens, and update blockchain contracts.
